mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record ( member_id, alcohol_id, photo_path, alcohol_percent_feeling, flavor_tag_list, star_score, scent_score, taste_score, texture_score, description, experience_date ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{alcoholId}, #{photoPathList, typeHandler=sullog.backend.common.mapper.typehandler.StringListTypeHandler}, #{alcoholPercentFeeling, typeHandler=sullog.backend.record.mapper.typehandler.AlcoholPercentFeelingTypeHandler}, #{flavorTagList, typeHandler=sullog.backend.record.mapper.typehandler.FlavorTagListTypeHandler}, #{starScore}, #{scentScore}, #{tasteScore}, #{textureScore}, #{description}, #{experienceDate} );
mapper.select: SELECT r.record_id AS record_id, r.description AS description, r.photo_path AS photo_path, a.alcohol_id AS alcohol_id, a.name AS alcohol_name, a.production_location AS production_location, a.production_latitude AS production_latitude, a.production_longitude AS production_longitude, a.alcohol_tag AS alcohol_tag, ab.name AS brand_name FROM record AS r LEFT JOIN (SELECT alcohol_id, brand_id, name, production_location, production_latitude, production_longitude, alcohol_tag FROM alcohol) AS a ON r.alcohol_id = a.alcohol_id LEFT JOIN alcohol_brand AS ab ON a.brand_id = ab.brand_id WHERE r.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT record_id, member_id, alcohol_id, photo_path, alcohol_percent_feeling, flavor_tag_list, star_score, taste_score, scent_score, texture_score, description, experience_date FROM record WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
SELECT a.alcohol_type FROM record AS r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM alcohol ) AS a ON r.alcohol_id = a.alcohol_id WHERE r.member_id = #{member_id}
